name: Duckie
headline: AI Assistant for Customer Support Teams
description:
Duckie is an AI assistant that helps customer support teams resolve tickets faster!

We integrate with existing customer support workflows to respond to customers directly, and answer questions that support agents may have. Does a customer need help onboarding? Duckie is there! Is your support agent looking for info on the latest changes to the product? Duckie is there! 

Duckie can be installed anywhere, from Slack and Discord to Zendesk and Intercom. And we integrate with both customer support and engineering knowledge bases to go beyond the documentation. By sourcing information from across your knowledge base, we can step in and help out before questions get sent into the void of escalations.

If you're looking to give your customer support team a super power, come to Duckie!

founders.name: Valerie Li, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder and CEO of Duckie. Prior to Duckie, she has been a senior engineer for 6+ years with expertise in infrastructure.
She was a tech lead at Netflix for 3 years, where she led the subscriber growth project that stopped password sharing, which added 8m new subscribers and $200m in revenue (and saved the company's stock price).
Before that she was an engineer at LinkedIn, and got her Computer Science degree from USC.

founders.name: Joel Ritossa, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO at Duckie. Former AI Software Engineer at C3 AI, built Enterprise AI solutions. Princeton CS Class of 2020. Solving technical support with Valerie Li.

## For Customers and CustomerSupport Teams ‍
[AI Support Agent](https://duckie.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[AI Support Copilot](https://duckie.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66f58c1a6d8e3c3c0242d995_tag_star.svg)
solve
### AI Support Agent
Duckie's AI agent delivers accurate responses directly to your customers.
Auto-responder
Automatically respond to support tickets for your customers.
Draft-responder
Draft responses for customer support agents to review before sending to customers.
[Learn more](https://duckie.ai/</ai-support-agent>)
Hey, I'm getting a "403 Forbidden: Access Denied" error when trying to access my dashboard through our proxy. Any ideas on how we can get around this?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Hello! I recall we encountered a similar issue before. We resolved it by updating the proxy settings, which you can see in our Support Docs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
The key steps are: ‚Äì Refreshing the API tokens ‚Äì Updating proxy server whitelist ‚Äì Verifying account permissionsNeed any help implementing these?
That's perfect! Refreshing the API token did the trick. You're a lifesaver, Duckie!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Fantastic news! I'm thrilled we could resolve this so quickly. üéâ
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66f58c54a51fa27a0a126527_tag_like.svg)
assist
### AI Support Copilot
Built for customer support agents, Duckie's AI copilot searches your company's knowledge base to provide instant, relevant answers and materials needed to power your support team.
[Learn more](https://duckie.ai/</ai-support-copilot>)
Hey Duckie! What permissions do our customers need to export their analytics data?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
According to our latest docs, customers need either 'Analytics Manager' or 'Admin' role to export analytics data. Here's a handy guide with all the details: Analytics Data Export Guide
Thanks, that's super helpful! What about importing analytics data? Is that something customers can do?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Based on a recent discussion in our Slack channel, importing analytics data isn't currently possible for customers to do directly. However, our engineering team can assist with data imports if needed. Here's the relevant conversation: Discussion on Analytics Data Import
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
If a customer requires data import, we should create a support ticket and involve the engineering team. There's an ongoing feature request to allow customer-side imports: DUC-789: Enable Customer Analytics Data Import
Fantastic! I'll let the customer know.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Let me know if you need anything else! üòä
### Log investigation
Duckie analyzes technical issues by examining logs, code changes, dashboards, and customer data, helping your technical support team troubleshoot and resolve tickets quickly.
[Learn more](https://duckie.ai/</log-investigation>)
Hey Duckie, Customer with ID CUST-7829-XF is reporting database is inaccessible. Can you look into the error logs and see if there's anything going on?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Certainly! I've checked the error logs for Customer ID CUST-7829-XF.I see that the AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED error is being thrown repeatedly. Here's a relevant snippet from the Kibana logs:
[2023-03-15T14:32:18.721Z] ERROR [auth-service] AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED customer_id: "CUST-7829-XF"error_details: { "message": "Authentication token has expired","token_expiry": "2023-03-15T14:30:00.000Z", "current_time": "2023-03-15T14:32:18.721Z" } failed_attempts: 3 last_successful_auth: "2023-03-14T09:45:12.103Z"
You can view the full logs here: Link
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
To resolve this, the customer will need to re-authenticate via our authorization console. They can follow the steps outlined in our Reset Guide.
Perfect! That worked. Thank you!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
I'm glad to hear that resolved the issue! If there's anything else I can help you with regarding Customer CUST-7829-XF's account, please don't hesitate to ask.
### Auto-updates and reminders
Duckie keeps your support team in the loop with automatic updates and reminders. It tracks code commits and product changes, linking Jira tickets and pull requests to support issues, and posts updates directly to Slack or Zendesk.
[Learn more](https://duckie.ai/</automated-product-updates>)
Hey Duckie, Customer with ID CUST-7829-XF is reporting database is inaccessible. Can you look into the error logs and see if there's anything going on?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
There is also an ongoing feature request to allow customer-side imports, which you can track in this Jira ticket: DUC-789.
Got it! I will keep that in mind. @Duckie, can you keep me posted on the progress of the ticket?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Update from DUC-789 - Pull Request #253 has been merged! üéâ üöÄ

## From Input to Insight: How Duckie Integrates, Learns, and Analyzes
### Deep knowledge integration
Duckie interfaces with support and engineering knowledge repositories, extracting critical data on support interactions, customer issue data, and engineering system. These integrations provide Duckie with a deep and comprehensive understanding of your entire support and product ecosystem.
### Continuous insights and learning
Our proprietary AI framework continuously analyzes your knowledge base to identify latent patterns and trends. Through an iterative learning process, Duckie maintains an evolving heuristic model of your support and engineering landscapes, adapting to new information in real-time.
### Advanced Al Analysis
Through our state-of-the-art LLMs, AI frameworks, and machine learning models, Duckie performs advanced analysis of user queries in real-time. Coupled with advanced guardrails, Duckie ensures high-fidelity and high-accuracy information processing and output generation.
![Deep knowledge integration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d7671f95c12f0e039d7b25_img_lottie_one.avif)

## Security and Trust
Enterprise-level Security
Duckie is compliant with the highest security protocols and standards for security and confidentiality.
Highest Grade Privacy
Your data is encrypted at rest, protected in transit, and our DPA complies with GDPR and CCPA.
Grounded in Truth
Duckie always provides sources to the answers it generates.
Previoustickets
Documen-tation
Self-hosting
We support self-hosting on AWS, Azure, and GCP, ensuring full control with top-tier security and performance.

Hey, I'm getting a "403 Forbidden: Access Denied" error when trying to access my dashboard through our proxy. Any ideas on how we can get around this?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Hello! I recall we encountered a similar issue before. We resolved it by updating the proxy settings, which you can see in our Support Docs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
The key steps are: ‚Äì Refreshing the API tokens ‚Äì Updating proxy server whitelist ‚Äì Verifying account permissionsNeed any help implementing these?
That's perfect! Refreshing the API token did the trick. You're a lifesaver, Duckie!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Fantastic news! I'm thrilled we could resolve this so quickly. üéâ
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66f58c54a51fa27a0a126527_tag_like.svg)
assist
### AI Support Copilot
Built for customer support agents, Duckie's AI copilot searches your company's knowledge base to provide instant, relevant answers and materials needed to power your support team.
Learn more‚ü®3‚ü©
Hey Duckie! What permissions do our customers need to export their analytics data?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
According to our latest docs, customers need either 'Analytics Manager' or 'Admin' role to export analytics data. Here's a handy guide with all the details: Analytics Data Export Guide
Thanks, that's super helpful! What about importing analytics data? Is that something customers can do?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Based on a recent discussion in our Slack channel, importing analytics data isn't currently possible for customers to do directly. However, our engineering team can assist with data imports if needed. Here's the relevant conversation: Discussion on Analytics Data Import
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
If a customer requires data import, we should create a support ticket and involve the engineering team. There's an ongoing feature request to allow customer-side imports: DUC-789: Enable Customer Analytics Data Import
Fantastic! I'll let the customer know.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Let me know if you need anything else! üòä
### Log investigation
Duckie analyzes technical issues by examining logs, code changes, dashboards, and customer data, helping your technical support team troubleshoot and resolve tickets quickly.
Learn more‚ü®4‚ü©
Hey Duckie, Customer with ID CUST-7829-XF is reporting database is inaccessible. Can you look into the error logs and see if there's anything going on?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
Certainly! I've checked the error logs for Customer ID CUST-7829-XF.I see that the AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED error is being thrown repeatedly. Here's a relevant snippet from the Kibana logs:
[2023-03-15T14:32:18.721Z] ERROR [auth-service] AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED customer_id: "CUST-7829-XF"error_details: { "message": "Authentication token has expired","token_expiry": "2023-03-15T14:30:00.000Z", "current_time": "2023-03-15T14:32:18.721Z" } failed_attempts: 3 last_successful_auth: "2023-03-14T09:45:12.103Z"
You can view the full logs here: Link
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
To resolve this, the customer will need to re-authenticate via our authorization console. They can follow the steps outlined in our Reset Guide.
Perfect! That worked. Thank you!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66d4029817d2263722e832a2_user_message.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cd7644dcffe5416ac24fb3/66e48f477399257cefa72fdb_duck_chat.avif)
I'm glad to hear that resolved the issue! If there's anything else I can help you with regarding Customer CUST-7829-XF's account, please don't hesitate to ask.
### Auto-updates and reminders
Duckie keeps your support team in the loop with automatic updates and reminders. It tracks code commits and product changes, linking Jira tickets and pull requests to support issues, and posts updates directly to Slack or Zendesk.

## From Input to Insight: How Duckie Integrates, Learns, and Analyzes
### Deep knowledge integration
Duckie interfaces with support and engineering knowledge repositories, extracting critical data on support interactions, customer issue data, and engineering system. These integrations provide Duckie with a deep and comprehensive understanding of your entire support and product ecosystem.
### Continuous insights and learning
Our proprietary AI framework continuously analyzes your knowledge base to identify latent patterns and trends. Through an iterative learning process, Duckie maintains an evolving heuristic model of your support and engineering landscapes, adapting to new information in real-time.
### Advanced Al Analysis
Through our state-of-the-art LLMs, AI frameworks, and machine learning models, Duckie performs advanced analysis of user queries in real-time. Coupled with advanced guardrails, Duckie ensures high-fidelity and high-accuracy information processing and output generation.
![Deep knowledge integration‚ü®36‚ü©]

### Advanced Al Analysis
Through our state-of-the-art LLMs, AI frameworks, and machine learning models, Duckie performs advanced analysis of user queries in real-time. Coupled with advanced guardrails, Duckie ensures high-fidelity and high-accuracy information processing and output generation.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Duckie**

Founded in 2023, Duckie is a San Francisco-based company that has quickly garnered attention as part of Y Combinator's Winter 2024 batch. The startup exists to empower customer support teams in the B2B SaaS space by integrating AI into their workflows. With a tiny team of two, they've set out with a clear mission: to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of customer support.

**What Duckie Does**

Duckie offers an AI assistant specifically crafted for customer support teams. The product facilitates faster ticket resolution by integrating seamlessly into existing systems, whether it's Slack, Discord, Zendesk, or Intercom. Looking to provide support during onboarding or to clarify product updates? Duckie's got your back. It can scour through knowledge bases to deliver timely and relevant answers to both customers and support agents alike.

Key Features:
- **AI Support Agent:** Duckie can auto-respond to customer inquiries, offering instant solutions drawn from previous interactions.
- **AI Support Copilot:** This feature aids support agents by searching through organizational knowledge to find the right information quickly.
- **Log Investigation:** It helps technical teams troubleshoot by analyzing logs and code changes, allowing for faster issue resolution.
- **Auto-updates and Reminders:** By tracking product changes and code commits, Duckie keeps teams updated so they can respond more effectively to customer queries.

**Use Cases**

Duckie has a particular focus on technical users, making it an invaluable tool for sectors like developer tools and fintech. For instance, it can quickly furnish answers to complex technical questions, such as user permissions or data import/export capabilities. 

**Integration and Security**

Duckie's flexibility allows it to embed within various platforms and channels, ensuring that it can operate where customers are‚Äîbe it on website widgets or as a bot in collaboration tools like Microsoft Teams and Slack. The platform is designed with enterprise-grade security, maintaining data integrity and compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

**Results So Far**

Initial reports from users suggest that Duckie significantly reduces resolution times‚Äîby up to 80%. They‚Äôre reporting substantial cost savings as well, with some teams saving over $210k annually. Additionally, Duckie has demonstrated a 71% ticket deflection rate, meaning many customer inquiries are resolved without needing to escalate.

**Closing Thoughts**

In a world where customer support teams are increasingly overwhelmed, Duckie positions itself as a crucial ally, transforming the way businesses interact with their customers. If you‚Äôre looking to supercharge your support operations, Duckie might just be the AI companion you need. Want to give it a try? Head to [Duckie's website](https://duckie.ai/) to start your free trial.

Duckie's mission to power customer support teams through AI could well define the future of customer service in tech‚Äîseamless, efficient, and, above all, user-friendly.
